name: Simple Platformer In Space
description:
Title: Simple Platformer in Space

Genre: Platformer

Made in GMS2

Sound: freesound.org

Controls:

Keyboard:

  • arrows - move left, right, crouch
  • Z - jump
  • X - use, must be pressed or continuously pressed
  • Enter - in-game menu.

Gamepad: (in brackets for X-box)

  • left stick - move left, right, crouch
  • 3 (A) - jump
  • 2 (B) - to use, must be pressed or continuously pressed
  • 10 (Start) - in-game menu

Story short: 

The hero wakes up in a cryopod. 

There is very little oxygen and it is constantly dwindling. 

Your task is to get the hero to the truck on autopilot and hope for the best.

In order for the truck to go, you have to get it: a navigation tablet and install the firmware, fuel tank and fill it up.

On the way you need to avoid damage from the various devices

Only one level, passing time is about 10 minutes.

Sound quite a mess. In the options you can completely turn it off.

Controls are not reconfigurable. But you can put more comfortable icons for marking.

The size of the window can be changed without going into options.

There are minor bugs, problems with animation.

Thanks for any feedback!
